```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#Libraries
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(countrycode) #Do this when you get to merge section
library(WDI)
```

```{r}
#Read data sets from Worldbank
CO2 <-
WDI(
  country = "all",
  indicator = "EN.ATM.CO2E.PC",
  start = 2000,
  end = 2019,
  extra = FALSE,
  cache = NULL,
  latest = NULL,
  language = "en"
)

GDP <-
  WDI(
  country = "all",
  indicator = "NY.GDP.PCAP.CD",
  start = 2000,
  end = 2019,
  extra = FALSE,
  cache = NULL,
  latest = NULL,
  language = "en"
  )
```

```{r}
#Cleaning the dataset
CO2 <- na.omit(CO2)
GDP <- na.omit(GDP)
CO2 <- CO2 %>%
  select(1,3,4,5)

GDP <- GDP %>%
  select(1,3,4,5)
```
